articles.description: Kabosu, the dog many know as Doge and the mascot of Dogecoin, sadly passed away earlier this year. Its owner later adopted another Shiba Inu called Neiro which caused a long blockchain civil war with multiple tokens battling it out for liquidity. Now a month later SlumDOGE, the man who became a millionaire off Dogecoin (but never sold), explains why Neiro is a moment for the dog coin community to unite.

articles.description:
The cryptocurrency market is lighting up with excitement as both Toncoin (TON) and Mpeppe (MPEPE) are showing green candles, signaling upward momentum. Investors are rushing to capitalize on the surge, particularly as these two projects offer unique value propositions in the evolving crypto space. Here’s an in-depth look at why Toncoin (TON) and Mpeppe (MPEPE) are capturing investor interest.
 
Toncoin (TON) Sees Strong Recovery Amid Market Uncertainty 
After facing challenges, Toncoin (TON) is experiencing a much-needed rebound. The recovery is a positive sign for investors who have been closely watching TON’s performance following its recent setbacks. Despite earlier concerns, the network’s technological infrastructure and the backing from the Telegram community remain strong, and this r…
articles.title: Toncoin (TON) and Mpeppe (MPEPE) Shows Green Candles, Investors Jump On Wave

articles.description:
As the global crypto market capitalization dips below $2 trillion, fear is spreading among investors. Yet, amid the downturn, savvy Dogecoin (DOGE) sharks are flocking to one of the fastest-growing presales in the market – Mpeppe (MPEPE). With its innovative approach to decentralized finance (DeFi) and community-driven growth, Mpeppe (MPEPE) is attracting both meme coin enthusiasts and serious investors looking for long-term value.
 
Crypto Market Dips Below $2 Trillion: A Turning Point for Investors? 
The global cryptocurrency market has dropped below the $2 trillion mark, sending shockwaves through the crypto community. For many, this represents a potential market correction, but for others, it’s an opportunity. As fear spreads, Dogecoin (DOGE) investors are looking for safer havens, and…

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
As the cryptocurrency world continues to expand, coins like Kaspa (KAS) are gaining significant traction alongside new meme-based tokens such as Mpeppe (MPEPE). In this article, we’ll explore Kaspa (KAS)’s KRC-20 token, make price predictions for Kaspa (KAS), and look into how Mpeppe (MPEPE) is reshaping the crypto landscape with its innovative approach to sports and gaming. 
 
Kaspa (KAS): A New Era for Blockchain Scalability 
Kaspa (KAS) is building a reputation as a highly scalable and secure blockchain solution. As a proof-of-work cryptocurrency with an advanced KRC-20 token standard, Kaspa promises fast transaction speeds without compromising on decentralization or security. For investors, this positions Kaspa (KAS) as a strong contender in the evolving blockchain space.
 
Mpeppe (MPE…
articles.title: Top Analyst Dive Into Kaspa KRC-20, KAS Price Prediction and Kaspa Investment Strategies

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
Despite a slight uptick in Dogecoin (DOGE) following a tweet from Elon Musk, the meme coin is still struggling to regain its former glory. Meanwhile, Mpeppe (MPEPE), a rapidly growing meme cryptocurrency, has captured the attention of investors looking for a more lucrative opportunity. Priced at just $0.0021, Mpeppe (MPEPE) has positioned itself as a “millionaire maker” in the world of crypto, overshadowing Dogecoin (DOGE) with its innovative approach and community-driven mission.
 
Elon Musk’s Influence: Can It Still Save Dogecoin? 
Elon Musk’s influence on Dogecoin (DOGE) has been well documented, with his tweets historically leading to sudden price spikes. However, despite his recent social media activity, Dogecoin (DOGE) has only seen a slight bump, leaving many investors wondering whe…

articles.author: Christian Encila
articles.description:
A hacker, known as Penpie, has laundered $27 million in Ethereum through the popular mixing service called Tornado Cash. Starting shortly after the hack on September 4, 2024, this attack points out some of the ongoing weaknesses in DeFi platforms. In fact, fast-moving funds by the hacker have set off several alarm bells about the efficacy of stolen asset tracking in cryptocurrency.
 
 
Swift Laundering Raises Concerns
 
Within just a few hours of the breach, the Penpie hacker routed some $7 million through Tornado Cash. And they were just getting started. Over the forthcoming days, they continued to move large sums in succession until a total of 11,261 ETH worth about $26.7 million had been transferred.
 
That’s quick work, and at this speed, many in the crypto community are finding it unb…
articles.title: Ignoring The Bounty, Penpie Hacker Launders $27 Million In Ether – What’s The Endgame?

articles.author: Jamie Redman

articles.title: Bitcoin Technical Analysis: Path to $58K Blocked by Heavy Resistance at $56,000

articles.author: Vivek Sen
articles.description:
Monochrome Asset Management announced its Monochrome Bitcoin ETF (IBTC) will implement proof-of-reserves verification through a new partnership with Hoseki. This makes IBTC the first Australian spot Bitcoin ETF to adopt such transparency measures.
Launched earlier this year, the Monochrome Bitcoin ETF has seen steady inflows totalling 134 Bitcoin worth over AUD 11 million. The fund is now collaborating with Hoseki to provide daily proof-of-reserves for its Bitcoin holdings.
Hoseki's advanced verification process, Hoseki Verified, will enable Monochrome to deliver independently verified evidence that investor assets are fully accounted for. This ongoing auditing sets a higher standard for transparency in Australian Bitcoin ETFs.
"Proof of reserves is important for establishing full operational transparency of a Bitcoin ETF," said Jeff Yew, CEO at Monochrome Asset Management. "Our partnership with Hoseki highlights our commitment to setting the highest standards for integrity and reliability in Bitcoin ETFs, setting a precedent for the industry."
According to Monochrome, the Hoseki integration also aligns with its unique capability for direct Bitcoin applications and redemptions, ensuring privacy while maintaining transparency.
As a leading Bitcoin verification provider, Hoseki will conduct real-time validation that IBTC's Bitcoin reserves match its stated holdings. This provides clear proof of assets to investors. The initiative may prompt broader adoption of rigorous verification measures across the Bitcoin ETF landscape.
articles.title: Australian Bitcoin ETF to Implement Proof of Reserves with Hoseki

articles.author: Scott Matherson
articles.description:
Charles Hoskinson, the founder of Cardano, has provided key insights into the next developmental and governance phases of Cardano and its Chang hard fork. With these plans set in motion, ADA, the native token of the Cardano ecosystem, has also seen a significant rise in a new metric, indicating a surge in investor interest and confidence. 
 
Upcoming Developments In The Cardano Network
 
In a recent YouTube video, Hoskinson revealed that the Cardano network is currently in a key stage, which he describes as a “90-day bootstrap phase,” where essential components of the network’s governance framework will be progressively activated. The Cardano founder provided a detailed update on the Chang hard fork road map, highlighting how the network will progress through the interim and bootstrap phas…
articles.title: Cardano Founder Reveals Where The Project Is Headed As ADA Metrics Turn Green

articles.title: BCB Group's Chief Compliance Officer to Exit in Latest Senior Management Departure

articles.author: Vivek Sen
articles.description:
Tokyo Electric Power Company (TEPCO), Japan's largest electricity provider, has begun mining Bitcoin through its subsidiary Agile Energy X using excess renewable energy that would otherwise be wasted, as per reports from Asahi.

JUST IN: 🇯🇵 Japan's largest power company TEPCO is mining #Bitcoin using surplus energy. pic.twitter.com/ZrsmbV7mv6
— Bitcoin Magazine (@BitcoinMagazine) September 9, 2024
  
  
  
With over 27 million residential and business customers, TEPCO established Agile Energy in 2022, and now they are exploring Bitcoin mining powered by surplus renewable energy. The subsidiary has installed mining rigs next to solar farms in Japan's Gunma and Tochigi prefectures.
The initiative helps reduce wasted green energy from solar and wind farms that are forced to curtail production to avoid overloading Japan's grid. This energy is now being diverted to generate Bitcoin.
"Green energy producers have to operate their businesses on the assumption that part of the power they generate is wasted," said Agile Energy President Kenji Tateiwa. "If bitcoins were to provide a new source of income for similar power producers, who are being exposed to overinvestments, that would prompt more green energy to be introduced."
The project shows how Bitcoin mining can incentivize renewable energy growth by providing producers with additional revenue streams. Tateiwa said Bitcoin profits could encourage further investment in clean energy to power the mining.
Other countries are also tapping excess renewables for Bitcoin mining, like El Salvador, which uses its geothermal energy. This dispels the myth that Bitcoin is environmentally hazardous, as much mining uses energy that would otherwise be wasted. 
More and more companies and countries are figuring out how to turn waste and surplus energy into the hardest money on earth. As more renewables come online, Bitcoin mining will help reduce wasted power and emissions.
articles.title: Japan's Largest Power Company TEPCO is Mining Bitcoin Using Renewables

articles.author: Tareq Sikder
articles.description:
Tokocrypto, a member of the Binance group, has been granted  
the Physical Crypto Asset Trader (PFAK) license by Indonesia’s Commodity  
Futures Trading Regulatory Agency (Bappebti). 
In 2024, Tokocrypto’s user base has expanded to over 4.5  
million, and the platform has reported a 138% increase in its monthly average  
trading volume. 
Gaining Full Authorization
The PFAK license is an important step for Tokocrypto. The  
firm initially registered as a Prospective Physical Crypto Asset Trader (CPFAK)  
in 2019. The recent licensing allows Tokocrypto to operate as a fully  
authorized physical crypto asset trader in Indonesia.
Richard Teng, CEO of Binance, acknowledged Tokocrypto’s  
achievement, noting Binance’s support in strengthening Indonesia’s Web3  
ecosystem. Teng highlighted Binan…
articles.title: Tokocrypto Bags PFAK with Binance Boost, Gaining Ground in Indonesia’s Crypto Arena

articles.author: Godspower Owie
articles.description:
Positive sentiment around Bitcoin, the largest cryptocurrency asset, is increasing significantly in the space as the coin is seeing a wave of bullish predictions from several market experts and enthusiasts, solidifying its stance as a leader in the general market.
 
Bitcoin Dominance Enters A Crucial Zone
 
As the market continues to rebound as a whole, Bitcoin is entering a key zone and is rapidly gaining market domination. The increasing dominance of Bitcoin indicates a change in perception among market players, who see it as a safer haven among the volatility of the larger cryptocurrency market.
 
 
Ash Crypto, a market expert and trader, pointed out the optimistic development on the X (formerly Twitter) platform, which has captured a lot of attention in the community. According to the …
articles.title: Bitcoin Dominance Strengthens In Key Zone, What Does This Mean For Altcoins?

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
As the meme coin market sees volatility this September, Brett (BRETT) and Pepecoin (PEPE) have taken a sharp 7% dive, triggering a new wave of interest in the rising star, Mpeppe (MPEPE). This price dip has created a buying opportunity for investors who are looking for the next big meme coin with staying power. Let’s explore why the market is reacting this way and how Mpeppe (MPEPE) is attracting a massive buying wave.
 
Brett (BRETT) and Pepecoin (PEPE) Experience Sharp Declines, What’s Happening? 
In a surprising turn of events, both Brett (BRETT) and Pepecoin (PEPE) saw a sudden 7% drop in their prices this week. Analysts attribute this to market corrections and profit-taking by early investors. The drop has caused some uncertainty within the meme coin community, but for opportunistic b…
articles.title: Brett Price Prediction September: Brett & Pepe Plummets 7% Creating Massive Buying Wave For Mpeppe (MPEPE)
